Name: Drunken Fight Simulator
About the game: High quality, realistic physics interactive, competing, compelling, Drunken Fight Simulation game. a fun and challenging fighting game with instant animation that occurs with physical interaction. Game Modes: 1v1 2 Players 3v3 2 Players 1v1 1v3 1v5 For real fun and drunken fighting experience, try Drunken Fighting Simulator. Note : Multiplayer will be added soon.
